sub_title: Meteorological Business Engineer at Infoplaza | PhD in atmospheric science | MSc in geophysics | interested in weather, climate and science
summary: I use my knowledge and skills in meteorology, data science and problem solving to innovate and develop weather products and solutions for consumers and businesses. I hold a PhD in atmospheric science from TU Delft, Netherlands and an MSc degree in geophysics from University of Münster, Germany.
